content.text: Write the following numbers correct to one significant figure
Give your answer correct to one decimal place
Calculate the exact value of \(m\) when \(h = 20\) and \(a = -5\)
The diagram shows two of the exterior angles of a regular polygon with \(n\) sides
The Tiger Sky Tower in Singapore has a viewing capsule which holds 72 people
This number is \(75\%\) of the population of Singapore when it was founded in 1819
What was the population of Singapore in 1819?
In a traffic survey of 125 cars the number of people in each car was recorded
The number of spectators at the 2010 World Cup match between Argentina and Mexico was
If each spectator paid 2600 Rand \((R)\) to attend the game, what is the lower bound for the total amount paid?
Write your answer in standard form
A water pipeline in Australia is a cylinder with radius 0.65 metres and length 85 kilometres
Calculate the volume of water the pipeline contains when it is full
Give your answer in cubic metres
Write the closing time on Saturday in the 12-hour clock time
Calculate the total number of hours the shop is open in one week
A shop is open during the following hours
List all the prime numbers which satisfy this inequality
A company sells cereals in boxes which measure \(10\mathrm{cm}\) by \(25\mathrm{cm}\) by \(35\mathrm{cm}\)
They make a special edition box which is mathematically similar to the original box
The volume of the special edition box is \(15 120 \mathrm{cm}^3\)
Work out the dimensions of this box
The mass, \(m\), of an object varies directly as the **cube** of its length, \(l\)

content.text: Find the deceleration of the car as it came to a stop

Complete the scatter diagram for these results
The first two points have been plotted for you
Describe the correlation between the two sets of data
Draw the line of best fit
A company sends out ten different questionnaires to its customers
The table shows the number sent and replies received for each questionnaire
Describe the **single** transformation which maps \(ABCD\) onto \(A'B'C'D'\)
Find the matrix which represents this transformation
On the grid on the next page, draw the image of \(PQRS\) after the transformation represented by \(\mathbf{BA}\)
Find \(\mathrm{gf}(3x)\), simplifying your answer as far as possible
The two lines \(y = 2x + 8\) and \(y = 2x - 12\) intersect the \(x\)-axis at \(P\) and \(Q\)

Find the equation of the line parallel to the line in **part (b)** passing through (5, 4)
